discourse_list.title: \xf0\x9f\x94\x8e Focus On #11: Navigating Real Estate Investment Markets with New Silver

content.content: Focus On #11: Navigating Real Estate Investment Markets with New Silver  On the 11th episode of Focus On, we will host Kirill Bensonoff @prankstr25 from New Silver for an AMA on Real Estate Investment Markets. For the newer community members at the DAO, New Silver was the first ‘real-world’ asset voted in by MakerDAO Governance, and will celebrate the 1 year anniversary of minting the first Dai backed by RWAs on 21-April. Following up their recent March 2022 update, New Silver will join Focus On to discuss the current macro and micro economic trends affecting the US real estate markets. We’ll discuss how inflation & rising interest rates may affect real estate investors. Kirill also plans to talk about New Silver’s current portfolio and the future outlook on these trends. The community is encouraged to come ready with questions for an open AMA at the end of the presentation.  Presentation Slides   Attn: @Recognized-Delegates, @GovAlpha-Core-Unit, @Risk-Core-Unit, @SES-Core-Unit, @Protocol-Engineering, @Growth-Core-Unit, @Oracles-Core-Unit, @gov-comms-core-unit, @collateral-core-unit, @happiness-core-unit, @dux-core-unit, @data-insights-cu, @immunefi-core-unit, @strat-fin-core-unit

Focus On Call - Episode #11  April 27th, 2022  Agenda   00:00: Intro with Retro  01:02: Discussion and Questions with Kirill Bensonoff and Alex Shvayetsky  50:19: Outro   Video https://youtu.be/P6Mw6xvBlZ0  Introduction  Retro  Agenda and Preamble 00:00  Hello, MakerDAO community. Welcome to episode #11 of Focus On. I am Retro from the Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling Core Unit. Today, I am excited to be joined by New Silver to give an update both on the housing market and a quick recap of the past year of New Silver serving as the first RWA onboarded by MakerDAO. April 21st, 2021, was the first Dai minted on-chain backed by RWA by New Silver. We will discuss the macro and micro-economic trends affecting the U.S. real estate markets and some strategies about how they plan to navigate the environment. For other episodes of FO, please check the forum.   Discussion  Kirill Bensonoff and Alex Shvayetsky 01:02  Focus On #11: Navigating the real estate investment markets with New Silver1443×818 149 KB   Goals for our time together1440×812 48.1 KB   Congrats! We have turned 1!1443×821 42.3 KB   We have accomplished a lot together1442×816 89 KB   The ever-evolving real estate market1440×812 117 KB   By The Numbers1434×813 180 KB   New Silver's Thoughts and Actions1442×806 169 KB   Planning for the future1441×815 66.5 KB   THANK YOU and AMA1439×805 66.9 KB   Questions 22:22 - Retro: Related to the credit score tightening, as the market improves, do you see the opportunity to take on more risk then? Is that time frame 12 months out that you are seeing, or would it be longer? 28:06 - Teej: Regarding credit scoring, in terms of this line in the sand between “borrowers with experience and without,” what is the science behind that? 33:36 - Teej: How do you think about when you underwrite what weights you are giving to LTC versus LTV as we shift into a new rising rate environment? 37:01 - Retro: Loans are typically about 12 months, and we are about at that 12-month period since your first onboarding. How are you seeing borrowers re-engaging with your team? Are you starting to build a client base that is consistently coming back? 40:22 - Retro: Is the surplus buffer going to be driven by new customer attraction and new market segments, or is it more of this repeat business that you feel? 42:28 - Teej: In terms of the New Silver product, is the intention to originate fixed or floating or both? Is the intention to stick within the single-family RESI wheelhouse or widen the aperture? 46:06 - Teej: Another nice feature of single-family stabilized is there is a large marginal buyer in the market in Blackstone and the Ilk. They will buy these things up in the thousands. 49:20 - Retro: What is the best way for the MakerDAO community to reach out and engage with the team?  Closing Comment  Retro  Outro 50:19  Thanks, everybody, for joining today. We will see you in the forums.   Credits  Kunfu-po produced this summary.  @gala produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call, listed in the headers.
Had to move it here (CrowdCast is down): https://meet.google.com/feu-epry-kie
Thank you to everyone who attended and to @Retro for organizing. Also, happy to answer any questions from anyone who was not able to make it.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
